sentences.sContent: ...a small port on the north-western extremity of the Iberian peninsula.
sentences.sCn: ...一个位于伊比利亚半岛最西北端的小港口。

synos.tran: 四肢，骨端；末端，极限（extremity复数形式）；手足

phrases.pCn: 极大的危险(或不幸消息)

trans.tranCn: 四肢，骨端；末端，极限（extremity复数形式）；手足
trans.tranOther: The extremity of something is its farthest end or edge
